Way of Will Anti-Aging Face Serum (2020 formulation)

Brand: Way of Will

Category: Serums & Essences
book: 1973-Way of Will Anti-Aging Face Serum (2020 formulation)

chunk: Ingredients: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Prunus armeniaca (apricot) kernel oil, Argania Spinosa kernel oil, Rosa rubiginosa Fruit Oil, Sesamum indicum (sesame) seed oil, Punica granatum seed oil, Daucus carota (carrot) root and Canola oil, Borago officinalis seed oil, Pelargonium graveolens flower/ leaf/ stem oil, Hippophae rhamnoides
book: 1973-Way of Will Anti-Aging Face Serum (2020 formulation)

chunk: indicum (sesame) seed oil, Punica granatum seed oil, Daucus carota (carrot) root and Canola oil, Borago officinalis seed oil, Pelargonium graveolens flower/ leaf/ stem oil, Hippophae rhamnoides oil, Tocopherol, Fusanus spicatus (sandalwood) Oil, Jasminum Grandiflorum Absolute, Citrus aurantium Flower Oil, Vitis vinifera (Grapeseed) oil
book: 1973-Way of Will Anti-Aging Face Serum (2020 formulation)

chunk: Warnings: For external use only. Use on local areas only. Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes. Avoid contact with open skin. Always skin test on a small area before use. Discontinue if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Store below 21C / 70F.
book: 1973-Way of Will Anti-Aging Face Serum (2020 formulation)

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 1973-Way of Will Anti-Aging Face Serum (2020 formulation)
